1.name: Barbell
1.comments: Values are calories per minute for someone weight ~57kg for a light/medium/intense workout.

2.name: SZ-Bar
2.comments: Actually this is just a more ergonomic barbell so i am using the simillar values here - 0.2 higher throughout cause i guess less strain = more gain? idk

3.name: Dumbbell
3.comments: Simillar to barbell. But harder to lift properly with it so i made the values 0.2 lower?

4.name: Gym Mat
4.comments: Since those workout collide with mat exercises, hence not used

5.name: Swiss Ball
5.comments: It's those bouncy balls, i have no clue what you can do with them

6.name: Pull-up bar
6.comments: I just got my answers from google's top ans

7.name: none (bodyweight)
7.comments: Assume 60kg. Exercises include situp, push-up, burpees, etc, just varying by intensity

8.name: Bench
8.comments: I realise you need a barbell to do BENCH press... so values same as barbell.

10.name: Kettleball
10.comments: WebMD says Kettlebell Workouts burn calories fast so i just put high values
